previous.excerpt:
25 Ways to Hide Your Valuables in Minecraft! Minecraft has plenty of valuable items, from diamonds to netherite. So, to make sure no one else on the SMP steals your items, then you've got to hide your diamonds in some secret chests and barrels. Here are some of the most insane ways to hide your diamonds, netherite, tools, armor, and so much more on the multiplayer server to make sure your friends never steal your items. Let's see some of the craziest foolproof ways to keep your diamonds safe and make sure nobody steals your stuff in this Skip the Tutorial list!

▪Want more? Subscribe Today! ▶https://goo.gl/ZDDJit

-OTHER LINKS-
▪Follow me on Twitter ▶https://twitter.com/skipthetweets
▪Join the Discord ▶https://discord.gg/eqxaSVH
▪Check out my Twitch ▶https://www.twitch.tv/skipthetutorial
▪Check out my Instagram ▶https://www.instagram.com/skipthetutorial/
▪Character done by MagnaGallina ▶https://twitter.com/MagnaGallina

Edited by: https://haleyascharf.com​​
Research and map by Jonah Walters
Footage collected by Frankie Mundo
------

previous.title: 25 Ways to Hide Your Valuables in Minecraft

localize.title: 25种方法来隐藏你的贵重物品在Minecraft的
localize.description:
25种方法来隐藏你的贵重物品在Minecraft! Minecraft 有很多有价值的物品，从钻石到etherite. 所以，要确保没有人在SMP上偷你的项目，那么你得把你的钻石藏在一些秘密的箱子和桶里。这里有一些最疯狂的方法，可以在多人服务器上隐藏你的钻石、阴石、工具、盔甲等等，确保你的朋友永远不会偷你的物品。让我们在这个跳过教程列表中看看一些最疯狂的傻瓜式方法来保护你的钻石安全，并确保没有人偷你的东西!

▪想知道更多？今天就订阅吧! ▶https://goo.gl/ZDDJit

-其他链接-
在Twitter上关注我▶https://twitter.com/skipthetweets。
加入讨论区 ▶https://discord.gg/eqxaSVH
查看我的Twitch ▶https://www.twitch.tv/skipthetutorial
查看我的Instagram ▶https://www.instagram.com/skipthetutorial/
角色由MagnaGallina完成▶https://twitter.com/MagnaGallina。

编辑：https://haleyascharf.com

镜头由Frankie Mundo收集

localize.title: 25種方法來隱藏你的貴重物品在Minecraft的
localize.description:
25種方法來隱藏你的貴重物品在Minecraft! Minecraft 有很多有價值的物品，從鑽石到etherite. 所以，要確保沒有人在SMP上偷你的項目，那麼你得把你的鑽石藏在一些祕密的箱子和桶裏。這裏有一些最瘋狂的方法，可以在多人服務器上隱藏你的鑽石、陰石、工具、盔甲等等，確保你的朋友永遠不會偷你的物品。讓我們在這個跳過教程列表中看看一些最瘋狂的傻瓜式方法來保護你的鑽石安全，並確保沒有人偷你的東西!

▪想知道更多？今天就訂閱吧! ▶https://goo.gl/ZDDJit

-其他鏈接-
在Twitter上關注我▶https://twitter.com/skipthetweets。
加入討論區 ▶https://discord.gg/eqxaSVH
查看我的Twitch ▶https://www.twitch.tv/skipthetutorial
